alert.note: Alert for Bell; Harlan (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 04 at 4:22PM EDT until June 04 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in JACKSON KY has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Harlan County in southeastern Kentucky... Southeastern Bell County in southeastern Kentucky... * Until 500 PM EDT. * At 421 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Hensley Store, or 9 miles south of Harlan, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Cubage and Martins Fork. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
